sentences.sContent: A fine start to the day, and my first sailfish on a fly.
sentences.sContent_eng: A fine start to the day, and my first sailfish on a fly.
sentences.sCn: 这一天的开局真不错，这也是我第一次用飞杆钓到旗鱼。

sentences.sContent: And both have been pioneers of strict marine conservation practices, including catch-and-release only policies for sailfish and marlin.
sentences.sContent_eng: And both have been pioneers of strict marine conservation practices, including catch-and-release only policies for sailfish and marlin.
sentences.sCn: 两国还率先实行了极为严格的海洋资源保护措施，其中包括对捕获的旗鱼和青枪鱼必须放生。

trans.tranOther: any of several large scombroid game fishes of the genus Istiophorus, such as I
